text: Ohio NORML is the National Organization for the Reform of Marijuana Laws affiliate for the U.S. state of Ohio. In 2015, the chapter's leader, Rob Ryan, was removed from his position for supporting ResponsibleOhio's effort to legalize marijuana. ==See also== * Cannabis in Ohio * List of cannabis organizations ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Cannabis in Ohio Category:Cannabis organizations Category:National Organization for the Reform of Marijuana Laws Category:Organizations based in Ohio
title: Ohio NORML
